page.title: 08WENNINGTON - THE COMMUNITY
page.content: The community consists basically of farming families with a few professional people moving in and out, rarely staying unless the remoteness of the village appeals to them. Most outsiders work away from the village, have their children educated elsewhere and socialise outside as well. Although some local children retain an interest in farming there seems to be a tendency for them to move away from the village, having been educated to a higher degree than their parents and having formed ideas and opinions which deter them from staying in such a remote place. However, it is felt there will always be a community here and the farming will continue despite the changes.
